front.title: BGP Flowspec for Computing-Aware Traffic Steering

abstract.t: Computing-Aware Traffic Steering (CATS) is a traffic engineering approach that optimizes traffic steering to a given service instance by taking into account the dynamic nature of both computing and network resources. This document extends Version 2 of the BGP Flow Specification (BGP-FS) to enable flow classification and path selection for CATS flow categories, thus supporting the deployment of CATS traffic optimization.
